terrapeer.net.helpers
Class RegistryVous

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          terrapeer.net.helpers.RegistryVous
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class RegistryVous
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

A servlet that tracks registrations of rendezvous peers and that itself instantiates a rendezvous peer.

See Also:

doIt

public void doIt(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                 java.io.IOException
Service a request. If the request contains the peerAd parameter, register the value of the parameter as a peer advertisement of an additional rendezvous peer. Otherwise, list each rendezvous peer in an XML document.

Parameters:
req - a HttpServletRequest value.
res - a HttpServletResponse value.
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if an error occurs.
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.
